title: Black Panther Open World Game in the Works!? - Kinda Funny Funny Games Daily 07.25.22
description:
Jeff Grubb is at it again! Blessing and Tim talk about the latest report of an EA Black Panther game, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor leaks, and remember Lord of The Rings: Gollum??

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
A new Xcast is up right now and it’s episode 100 featuring appearances from Alanah Pearce and Major Nelson! Go check that out right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
Also, are you one of those Marvel freaks? Well you’re in good company. We got reactions to those Comic-con announcements of Phase 5 and 6 over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.
Also also, are you a fan of the Gamescast Post Show? Well the Kinda Feudy questionnaire is back. I’ve posted it on my Twitter. Click the link, fill out the Google Form, and you can help shape the answers in a future game of Kinda Feudy.
https://twitter.com/BlessingJr/status/1551605268386947073
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Gordon McGuire, & Al Tribesman
The Roper Report  -
00:10:40 - A new Black Panther game is reportedly in the works - Mike Minotti @ GamesBeat
00:16:50 - What would make this THE quintessential Black Panther game? - Best Friends Q:JakeBakesCakes
00:26:19 - Ubisoft’s Roller Champions will soon be canceled, it’s claimed - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:31:15 - The Joker Won't Be in Gotham Knights - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:38:06 - Ad
00:39:30 - Star Wars Jedi: Survivor Looks To Be Launching in March 2023 - Matt Lorrigan @ PlayStation Trophies
00:44:00 - SPEAKING OF STAR WARS JEDI SURVIVOR: We got some Cal Kestis toys at Comic-con - Andrew Reiner @ Game Informer
00:47:08 - Square Enix’s Tactics Ogre remake leaks again and coming this November - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:54:00 - Microsoft is speeding up the Xbox Series X / S boot time - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:55:20 - Lord of the Rings Gollum has been delayed - Twitter
01:00:00 - Out today
01:01:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Janet and Gary
itunes:author: Kinda Funny

content:encoded:
Jeff Grubb is at it again! Blessing and Tim talk about the latest report of an EA Black Panther game, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor leaks, and remember Lord of The Rings: Gollum??


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:05:30 - Housekeeping

A new Xcast is up right now and it’s episode 100 featuring appearances from Alanah Pearce and Major Nelson! Go check that out right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Also, are you one of those Marvel freaks? Well you’re in good company. We got reactions to those Comic-con announcements of Phase 5 and 6 over on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.

Also also, are you a fan of the Gamescast Post Show? Well the Kinda Feudy questionnaire is back. I’ve posted it on my Twitter. Click the link, fill out the Google Form, and you can help shape the answers in a future game of Kinda Feudy.
